## ValidationErrorRenderer.update() method

Updates rendered errors for current state and returns true if errors were rendered, otherwise false

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
update(errorMessages?: StringDictionary, onlyShow?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  errorMessages | StringDictionary | Object storing error messages to be used as override |
|  onlyShow | boolean | Indication that update performs only displaying of existing errors |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
